backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend feature changes with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend source files related to the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main homepage component with Yes/No interactions, couple photo image picker, and modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ValentineModal.t: Success modal with image picker, escape and backdrop dismissal, and celebratory visuals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientImagePreview: Hook providing client-side image validation, preview generation, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context managing login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers plus extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and adds utility animation delays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then mounts App with global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s Valentine-themed website features, architecture notes, and existing requirements.
